problem: 如图,△ABC是⊙O的内接三角形,AC是⊙O的直径,∠C=60°,∠ABC的平分线BD交⊙O于点D,则∠BAD的度数是()
answer: 解:∵AC是⊙O的直径,∴∠ABC=90°,∵∠C=60°,∴∠BAC=30°,∵∠ABC的平分线BD交⊙O于点D,∴∠ABD=∠DBC=45°,∴∠CAD=∠DBC=45°,∴∠BAD=∠BAC+∠CAD=30°+45°=75°,故选:C．
comment: 本题考查的是圆周角定理,即在同圆或等圆中,同弧或等弧所对的圆周角相等,直径所对的圆周角是直角．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC is the inscribed triangle of ⊙O, AC is the diameter of ⊙O, ∠C = N_0, the bisector of ∠ABC intersects ⊙O at point D, then the degree of ∠BAD is ()
